          int PANEL_HEIGHT
        • PANEL_WIDTH
          int PANEL_WIDTH
          variables to keep track of panel width, panel height, the starting location of Pacman and the maximum number of each ghost. There's also a counter to spawn the ghosts and a boolean variable to keep track if there is a game over or not.
        • playing
          boolean playing
        • score
          int score
        • timer1
          Timer timer1
          Timer to advance the program each millisecond to play the game, plus a score variable to keep track of the total score.
